phrs.translation: 萨凡纳艺术设计学院, 萨凡纳艺术与设计学院(Savannah College Of Art And Design), 阿布扎比统计中心, 稳定性冠心病
SD高达, 急速流星锤, 钢弹流星锤

sentences.sentence: I finally discovered what I wanted to do when I attended SCAD.
sentences.translation: 在我进入SCAD时，我终于发现我到底想做什么。

sentences.sentence: And this returns us to the SCAD jumping paradigm used by David Eagleman.
sentences.translation: 让我们返回到大卫使用的SCAD跳模式。

sentences.sentence: SCAD diving was just what David needed - it was definitely terrifying.
sentences.translation: SCAD跳正是大卫所需要的，这玩艺绝对可怕。
